name: PR_EST_SEARCH_PARAMS
description: Contains information about an audited search run in Cost Calculator.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the patient estimate record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SEARCH_RESULTS_CNT
columns.description: A numeric item for holding the number for successful results found in a Cost Calculator search.

columns.name: SEARCH_RANGE
columns.description: The range in miles that the user searched from their starting zip code.

columns.name: SEARCH_ZIP
columns.description: The zip code that was used to search for providers.

columns.name: SEARCH_LATITUDE
columns.description: The latitude value of the search from Cost Calculator.

columns.name: SEARCH_LONGITUDE
columns.description: The longitude value of the search from Cost Calculator.

columns.name: MIN_PRICE
columns.description: The lowest price found for the related search parameters.

columns.name: MAX_PRICE
columns.description: The highest price found for the related search parameters.
